Submodules¶

eudtrg.base.stocktrg module¶

Defines stock conditions & actions. You are most likely to use only conditions declared in this file. This file also serves as a basic reference for trigger condition / actions.

ex) You want to create ‘Create Unit’ action:
  1. Remove spaces. ‘CreateUnit’
  2. Find ‘CreateUnit’ in this file. You’ll see the following function def.
def CreateUnit(Number, Unit, Where, ForPlayer):
  1. Make your action as mentioned here.
ex) CreateUnit(30, ‘Terran Marine’, ‘Anywhere’, Player1)

eudtrg.base.trgstrconst module¶

Module contents¶

Core of eudtrg. Everything in eudtrg are implemented using eudtrg.base Core defines

  • EUD Object (EUDObject class)
  • Trigger (Trigger, Condition, Action class)
  • Raw bytes object (Db)
  • Calculation of expression containing addresses. (Expr class)
  • Map reading/writing (LoadMap, SaveMap)
